name: Big Powderhorn
description: If you want to experience real "Lake Effect" powder, Big Powderhorn Mountain is right in the middle of the famous Big Snow Country in Michigan’s beautiful Upper Peninsula. With two full-service restaurants, a dedicated beginner lift, a charming Bavarian-style village, and 17 feet of annual natural snowfall see for yourself why Big Powderhorn was voted the #1 “Mom & Pop” ski resort in the country by Men’s Journal.
